title: Oh Penne Lyrics Vanakkam Chennai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Oh Penne
Singers: Anirudh, Vishal Dadlani
Lyrics: Na. Muthukumar
Music: Anirudh Ravichander
Movie: Vanakkam Chennai (2013)		.


Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Un kaigal korthu, unnodu poga
en nenjam thaan yengudey
dhinam uyir vaangudhey
un Thozhil saayndhu kanmodi vazha
en ullam alaiaayudhey
ayyo thadumaarudhey

kannam meley, mazhai neerai poley
mutham kolam poda aasai
allaadudhey,
nee pesum pechu naalthorum ketu,
endham jenmam
theera yekkam thallaadudhey.

Oh penne penne en kanney kanney
unmai sonnaal enna
unnai thandhaal enna (2)

never wanna see ..
forget the thunder n lightening
hold you to see the morning light
never leave your faith

Yezhu kadjal thaandi unnakaaga
vandheney
Indha nadhi vandhu kadal
serudhey
en nilavai vetti modhirangal
seiveney
adhu unnai sera oli veesudhey

Andha vinmeengal thaan
undhan kanniniley
vandhu kudiyerave konjam
edamketkudhey
indha un kaiyile naan
nool bommaye
oonjal pol maarudhey
adi un penmaye

Oh penne penne en kanney kanney
unmai sonnaal enna
unnai thandhaal enna (2)

Un kaigal korthu, unnodu poga
en nenjam thaan yengudey
